title: humanDAO Genesis Badge
name: humanDAO Genesis Badge
description: Awarded to those helping bootstrap the humanDAO during its launch. The name humanDAO is a nod to the Human Fund from the TV show Seinfeld. We agree with George Costanza, there should be a Human Fund, this is our attempt.
